dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, uh, this new cancer drug coming out of Kazakhstan, right? Like, seriously groundbreaking stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so, uh, this new cancer drug coming out of Kazakhstan, right? Like, seriously groundbreaking stuff.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes! I was just reading about this! Minister Nurbek, um, announced it himself!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, yes! I was just reading about this! Minister Nurbek, um, announced it himself!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Minister of Science and Higher Education Sayasat Nurbek announced the creation of a cancer drug in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And the clinical trials, they're like, full steam ahead, ongoing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And the clinical trials, they're like, full steam ahead, ongoing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the minister, active clinical trials are currently ongoing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ongoing! And they finished second-level last year already, remember?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ongoing! And they finished second-level last year already, remember?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We completed second-level clinical trials last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! And get this, it's being tested for all types of cancer now. Not just, um, colon cancer like before.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! And get this, it's being tested for all types of cancer now. Not just, um, colon cancer like before.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is tested for all types of cancer. Last year, we tested only for colon cancer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: All types! Yes! That's, like, a huge expansion. Massive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: All types! Yes! That's, like, a huge expansion. Massive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Massive! And they plan to, uh, register it and get it to market by the end of this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Massive! And they plan to, uh, register it and get it to market by the end of this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We plan to register this drug and enter the market by the end of this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The end of this year! That's so fast! And the results, they're calling them "very good, stable."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The end of this year! That's so fast! And the results, they're calling them very good, stable.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The results are very good, stable, and many patients have responded well," Nurbek said at a government briefing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Very good, stable! And patients, Host_B, are experiencing remissions. Tumors shrinking by 30% on average!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Very good, stable! And patients, Host_B, are experiencing remissions. Tumors shrinking by thirty percent on average!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to him, patients who participated in the drug testing began to experience remissions (disappearance or reduction of disease symptoms - ed.), and the size of tumors decreased by an average of 30%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Thirty percent! I saw that! That's not, like, a small, um, reduction. That's significant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thirty percent! I saw that! That's not, like, a small, um, reduction. That's significant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's not. And the Ministry of Health is, uh, helping to, like, shorten procedures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's not. And the Ministry of Health is, uh, helping to, like, shorten procedures.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Health is helping us a lot here. We have now shortened the procedures as much as possible without causing any damage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! So they really can hit that end-of-year registration target.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! So they really can hit that end-of-year registration target.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's just, um, incredible. Like, potentially life-changing for so many.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just, um, incredible. Like, potentially life-changing for so many.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Truly incredible. And they're holding a big conference, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Truly incredible. And they're holding a big conference, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We will hold a conference and present it by the end of this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, by the end of the year to present everything. So much to look forward to.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, by the end of the year to present everything. So much to look forward to.
